items.title: Hugging Face: 5 ways enterprises can slash AI costs without sacrificing performance
items.description: Ultimately, model makers and enterprises are focusing on the wrong issue: They should be computing smarter, not harder.

items.title: GEPA optimizes LLMs without costly reinforcement learning
items.description: Moving beyond the slow, costly trial-and-error of RL, GEPA teaches AI systems to learn and improve using natural language.

items.title: TensorZero nabs $7.3M seed to solve the messy world of enterprise LLM development

items.title: The looming crisis of AI speed without guardrails

items.title: Teaching the model: Designing LLM feedback loops that get smarter over time
items.description: How to close the loop between user behavior and LLM performance, and why human-in-the-loop systems are still essential in the age of gen AI.
